name: ProgressLinear.Root
description: An element that shows either determinate or indeterminate progress.
description_zh: An element that shows either determinate or indeterminate progress.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; track: string; label: string; circle: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the progress bar. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 进度条中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

max.description: The maximum allowed value of the progress bar.

min.description: The minimum allowed value of the progress bar.

value.description: The current value of the progress bar.
